scripts.start: npm run copy-server-binary && cd ../ && make run-backend  & cd ../frontend/ && export BROWSER=none && npm start
scripts.build: npm run copy-server-binary && cd ../frontend/ && export PUBLIC_URL='.' npm run build && cp -r ../app/electron/. build/electron
scripts.package: mkdir -p build && cp -r ../frontend/build/* ./build && electron-builder build --mac --win --linux -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron/main.js --publish never
